title: Slightly Scary Stories
brief_description: There are three stories on this video: “The Trip” about a lonely boy who constructs a shoebox diorama of the city and flies off to visit old friends. “Georgie” a homeless ghost searching for a new haunt and “A Dark, Dark, Tale” …’Once upon a time there was a dark, dark moor. On the moor there was a dark, dark wood…’
